name: ACID-PAK 4-WAY 2X®
description: Acid-Pak 4-Way 2X® is a unique combination of buffered acidifiers, lactic acid-producing bacteria, enzymes and electrolytes designed for pigs and poultry. Adding it to drinking water or completed feed is an effective approach to acidification, which promotes gut health, especially when intake is low or variable. It is designed to help “feed the gut” equip pigs and birds with the best foundation for healthy growth and build natural defenses.
